summary: I present to you the most realistic form of CBBE, and the most realistic model of the female body, out of all that are available on the Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i48.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0713/48/1eb7930f16c88b77637e6ab971bdca48.png[/IMG][/URL]

Most realistic form from CBBE (one of the most decent of alterations vanilla body.)

Requirements: Any textures created for CBBE
(For proper work of the modification required textures from original mod CBBE or other textures for CBBE.
Compactible with all textures, armor and clothing, created for the original CBBE.

____________________________________________________________________________________________
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

specifications body replacer:
new model
new skinning

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
____________________________________________________________________________________________

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 1.01: changed the minimum morph breast. Added new optional files to the new breast size.
standard breast size has universal proportions.more realistic size of 15% less than the standard.all other optional sizes larger.

If breast size for you seem like much. you can press the "~" /showracemenu /enter
[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i47.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0719/a5/ad28edf87faf6fb03cfe959d156b83a5.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

installation (Do not use installation from Download manager):
1. open the archive and copy the folder "main data files" in the game folder "Skyrim"
then if you want you can install optional files.

[URL=http://fastpic.ru/][IMG]http://i47.fastpic.ru/big/2013/0713/d7/f42f1c0db2f4f7744176449e6eec68d7.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
